title: Amid heat wave, Delhi's peak power demand reaches all-time high of 8,647 MW
description: Delhi experienced its highest peak power demand ever at 8,647 MW due to a persistent heatwave. The increased use of air conditioning and cooling appliances contributed to the record rise in power demand.
